title: possible solution to increase champion diversity without increasing the amount of bans in the lobby.
body:
add an in client poll that asks each player to choose their most hated champion. top ten on the list get banned in every draft game automatically and get placed on the list for nerfs. yes, this means that champions that are designed to make the enemy have a bad time will more often get nerfed, and yes, this means that making champions like that is bad design.
 also make it so that players can change their pick whenever they want, and for this service to be on for the rest of the game.

replies.body: TO the last comment, NOPE! All I see is ahri, akali, yasuo, n **** like them being ignored, and any assassin that does their job other than Kat getting nerfed to Oblivion! Oh, a good rengar player can do something other than feed our favorites, like garen and trynd? LETS REMOVE HIS Q! Still does dmge?! OH GOD HOW COULD HE? LETS JUST MAKE HIM ****EN BRAUM

of course the idea is that everyone would get to choose one, but I guess i can understand where your coming from with this list.

My most hated champion is vayne. Because she exists I can't play tanks that don't directly counter her unless i know that she won't be picked.
I feel like this will create more {{champion:99}}problems{{champion:103}} than it would solutions.
how so? I only see characters that most everyone considers to be unfun to be unplayed for a patch or two, then they get nerfed and a new batch of unfun terrible characters get removed.
